EmailTemplate.description: Response for ADAM webinar promoted by ILTA
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jun08 ADAM Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: CONFIRMATION: IntApp Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp webinar. Date: Monday, June 30 Time: 12 pm (Eastern) / 9 am (Pacific)
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=adam&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: adam
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 888-455-9639 (give operator the passcode: "adam" and conference leader's name: "Thad Jampol")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
http://www.intapp.com All information Copyright 2008 IntApp, Inc. All rights reserved.
